title: ERCOT’s market is transitioning toward storage and solar
description: Texas added over 11,000 megawatts of new electric capacity in 2025, led by 5,200 megawatts of battery storage and 4,500 megawatts of solar power, according to the Electric Reliability Council of Texas.
content: Texas added over 11,000 megawatts of new electric capacity in 2025, led by 5,200 megawatts of battery storage and 4,500 megawatts of solar power, according to the Electric Reliability Council of Texas.
